sentences.english: Then the nail must be straightened before it can be hammered into place correctly.
sentences.chinese: 於是在把釘子正確地釘入之前，需要先弄直它。

sentences.english: Then I became an imaginary enemy to myself.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我成了我自己的假想敵。

sentences.english: I shook my head reprovingly, and then she blushed and whispered.
sentences.chinese: 我不以爲然地搖搖頭，於是她臉紅了，小聲說。
於是，基裏洛夫犧牲了自己。

sentences.english: So the Giant built a high wall all round the garden.
sentences.chinese: 於是巨人在花園周圍築起一堵高高的牆。

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，於是老闆就賣左比個老鼓手。

sentences.english: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim;
sentences.chinese: 於是，何西阿去娶了滴拉音的女兒歌篾。

sentences.english: And then, Hu Yin comes here every evening.
sentences.chinese: 於是，胡公子每天晚上都來。

sentences.english: So they moved the ark of the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 於是將以色列神的約櫃運到那裏去。

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人於是就收斂起自己惡的一面，於是就積善行德。

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人於是就收斂起自己惡的一面，於是就積善行德。

sentences.english: Yesterday I made mistakes, then I correct them today and warn myself not to mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我犯錯了，於是我今天改過並告誡自己不可重犯。

sentences.english: The sexton therefore took him into his house, and he had to ring the church bell.
sentences.chinese: 於是司事就將老二帶走了，讓他在教堂敲鐘。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor qunosity products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 於是多量浙江一帶產的劣質產品起初進入市場。

sentences.english: Then, he begins to degenerate, indulge woman's charms.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他開始墮落，沉迷女色。

sentences.english: Rarr; So I chaffed them because I didn't believe their words.
sentences.chinese: 於是我揶揄他們因爲我不相信他們的話。

definition: as for/as to/to go so far as to
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
